data.title: Volodymyr Hlushchenko, MBA on LinkedIn: Simpler Web 3 from UD to Z
data.meta_description:
Zerion warm welcome to the #UDfam. 
Exited about this partnership!
data.text:
🚀 N-iX has achieved the #AWS Financial Services Competency, marking a significant milestone in our journey to empower financial services companies with secure, compliant, and innovative cloud solutions! We’re now one of only 75 companies out of 130,000+ AWS partners worldwide to receive this recognition. “This competency sets N-iX apart with the expertise to meet the industry's strict regulatory requirements, drive digital transformation, enhance customer experiences, and improve operational efficiency. It underscores our commitment to helping financial institutions leverage AWS for agility, scalability, and cost-effectiveness,” shares Orest Furhala, Head of Alliances and Partnerships at N-iX. 🤝 As an AWS Advanced Tier Services partner, we're committed to helping companies in finances maximize the value of their AWS Cloud initiatives. Learn more about our AWS Financial Services competency: https://lnkd.in/dM3eiTHj #AWSPartner #FinancialServices #CloudInnovation

🎉 N-iX is turning 22 this August! 🎉 Our journey has been marked by growth, evolution, and significant achievements, all thanks to our technology-driven team and our valued partners. With N-iX locations in 12 countries around the globe 🌍, we continue to bring innovation and fresh perspectives across industries and markets. Our focus remains on empowering our clients with advanced technology and effective solutions. Here's to many more years of innovation and excellence! 👏 #N_iX_turns22 #22years_of_impact

Ready for Money20/20 Europe? 🥳 Meet our team in Amsterdam from June 4-6: Yuriy Voloshynskyy, Andriy Sharandakov, Anna Panchenko, and Volodymyr Hlushchenko, MBA N-iX is the ultimate ally for digital transformation, modernization, and top-tier services in Banking, Capital Markets, and Insurance. We combine cutting-edge technologies with strong engineering expertise to help our clients exceed their goals. 🤝 By supporting clients across the UK, EMEA, and North America, including Fortune 500 companies, we help drive innovation in the finance industry. 📍 Visit us at Booth #8B169. Book a meeting here: https://lnkd.in/d4wNuQQE #Money2020 #Fintech #Payments #Banking #Insurance #CapitalMarkets #DigitalFinance

From mobile payments to robo-advisors, technology has changed the way we manage and interact with our finances. As a result, traditional financial institutions are facing pressure to adapt and innovate to stay in the game. Whether your organization wants to speed up digital transformation, fill the gap in tech expertise, develop a solution from scratch, or get expert consulting, partnering with a software development company can become a sensible first step in this transformation journey. 🚀 Meet our team at #Money2020 in June to explore how N-iX solutions can address the challenges and goals of your organization. ➡️ Connect with our experts Yuriy Voloshynskyy, Andriy Sharandakov, Anna Panchenko, and Volodymyr Hlushchenko, MBA directly or contact us here: https://lnkd.in/dkERYWUu #DigitalFinance #Fintech #Banking #Insurance #CapitalMarkets

Solana just launched an attack on Ethereum in a video troll 🤣 This is happening amid a huge resurgence in activity at Solana, which many called 'dead' after the FTX events. Credits for the catch go to Aram Mughalyan 👈 follow him for more great updates like this one👌 Find this helpful? [ 𝗿𝗲𝗽𝗼𝘀𝘁 ] Anything to add about this subject? [ 𝗶𝗻𝘃𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝘁𝗼 𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 ] Nice story, Marcel. Next! [ 𝗹𝗶𝗸𝗲 ]
